title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 190 - Minimum Wage Order For Farm Workers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 190 - Minimum Wage Order For Farm Workers

State Regulations

Subpart 190-1 - Coverage (§ 190-1.1 to 190-1.3)

Subpart 190-2 - Minimum Wage, Piece Rate And Youth Rate (§ 190-2.1 to 190-2.4)

Subpart 190-3 - Allowances (§ 190-3.1 to 190-3.5 to 190-3.11)

Subpart 190-4 - Rehabilitation And Vocational Education Programs (§ 190-4.1 to 190-4.2 to 190-4.9)

Subpart 190-5 - Deductions And Expenses (§ 190-5.1)

Subpart 190-6 - Posting And Notification (§ 190-6.1)

Subpart 190-7 - Denial Or Revocation Of Certificates Or Approval (§ 190-7.1)

Subpart 190-8 - Employer Records (§ 190-8.1 to 190-8.2)

Subpart 190-9 - Occupations In Agriculture Particularly Hazardous For The Employment Of Children Below The Age Of 16 (§ 190-9.1 to 190-9.3)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 190

Statutory authority: Labor Law, art. 2, § 21[11], art. 19, §§ 21, 652, 673, 674, as amd. by L. 2013, ch. 57

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subpart 190-1 - Coverage (§ 190-1.1 to 190-1.3)

Subpart 190-8 - Employer Records (§ 190-8.1 to 190-8.2)

Notes
